events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on our careers portal.
The application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on the candidate's skills and job applied for.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully and the candidate demonstrated strong foundational knowledge in software development.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the engineering team to further assess the candidate's programming skills.
